Package datastorage

Class PatientDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastorage.DAOimp<Patient>
      • datastorage.PatientDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO<Patient>
    public class PatientDAO
extends DAOimp<Patient>
    Implements the Interface DAOImp. Overrides methods to generate specific patient-SQL-queries.
